description.@en: I was once gravely injured by a riotous spirit, but now I am prepared. My arsenal of healing remedies keeps me and mine safe and must always be at full stock, lest we fall prey to another blight.

effect.@en: Whenever you suffer an Injury, spend a Coin to stave off its effects for twenty-four hours. However, whenever you don’t have at least three tinctures on hand, you are unable to restore your Damage Condition Track positively until you do.
